resources.string: The server cannot or will not respond to the request because of dubious client information error
Your login session has expired. Please log in again
The request is valid but not approved by the server. The user is not granted enough necessary permissions to access, or another account with sufficient permissions is required to access
The requested data could not be found but may be available in the future
A request method is not supported for the requested data field
The requested data field may only create content that does not allow the header of \"Agree\" to send requests
The client must first authenticate itself with the proxy.
Tour departure time of your chosen tour is shorter or longer than our regulations, please choose the Tour with suitable departure time
An error occurred. Please try again.
The email address or phone number is already used by another account
The phone number is already used by another account
An error occurred. Please try again
Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again
You have requested more than the specified time. Try again after 24 hours
